mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from( select * from board order by ref desc, re_step asc) a)b where b.rm >=#{startRow} and b.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount +1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select upload from board where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update board set re_step = re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step>#{re_step}
